messages.content: You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
실질적인 시간 조작을 할 순 없지만 사고 가속 정도는 어려운 마법이라도 분명히 가능한 범위 안에 있다.
While actual manipulation of time was beyond reach, accelerating one's thoughts was certainly within the realm of possibility, even for the more challenging magic.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
그녀의 마법이 펼쳐지고 8서클 커스텀 스페이스 마법으로 공간을 확장시킨 곳에서 이미 두 사람은 녹초가 될 때까지……. 내게 두드려 맞았다.
By the time her magic unfolded and she expanded the space with an 8th Circle Custom Space Magic, the two were already in a sorry state. They had been beaten to the point of exhaustion by me.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
지금부터…… 끅! 아이고 취한다. 속성 과외를 해줄 테니 잘 보라고…… 끅!
“From now on... Hicc! Ah, I'm getting tipsy. I'll tutor you on attributes, so watch carefully... Hicc!”
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
속성 과외요? 어떻게요?
“Crash course? What do you mean?”
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
끅! 으어어…… 그래. 내가 지금부터 널 팰 거다. 끅! 넌 거기에 맞춰 피하거나 반격하면 되는거다. 끅!
“Hicc! Ugh... Right. I'm going to beat you up starting now. Hicc! You just need to dodge or counter. Hicc!”
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
신혼여행을 끝내고 돌아가기 전 절대보옥에 대한 정보를 얻거나 가능하면 회수하기 위해 동부로 향하는 행렬 내내 나는 한자성을 거의 시체가 될 정도로 쥐어패…
Thus, before returning from his honeymoon, Davey tortured Han Ja-Sung almost to death as they journeyed east, seeking information on the Absolute Jewel in an attempt to retrieve it.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
공격이 너무나도 맹렬했기 때문에 한자성은 죽음을 애원했다.
The attacks were so ferocious that Han Ja-Sung pleaded for death instead.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
"걱정 마. 사람은 그렇게 쉽게 죽지 않아."
"Don't worry. People don't die that easily."
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
그 말은 데이비가 언제나 천지희에게 했던 말이었고, 천지희는 한자성의 비참한 상태를 볼 때마다 매번 당황했다.
That was what Davey always told Cheon Ji-Hee, who was at a loss every time she saw Han Ja-Sung's miserable state.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
무림에서 도화선녀라 불리며 많은 명성을 가지고 있는 곽미영은 아무 말도 하지 않았다. 그리고, 그녀의 곁에 있던 곽준성 또한 아무런 말도 하지 않았다. 그저 멍하니 기절한 천지희와 자성을 바라볼 뿐이다. 자성은 딱히 놀라울 정도의 힘을 보여주진 않았다.

In the realm of martial arts, renowned as the "Peach Blossom Fairy" for her unparalleled reputation, Gak Mi-Young maintained a stoic silence. Beside her, Gak Joon-Seong mirrored her reticence, their attention fixed on the unconscious figure of Cheon Ji-Hee. Curiously absent was any display of extraordinary power from Ja-Seong.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
그렇게 죽은 듯 산 듯 한자성을 굴려댄 결과. 단전이 파괴된 그의 육신에 새로운 내공이 깨어나기 시작했다. 이미 파괴된 단전이 아닌, 새로이 구현된 천혼지체의 단전에.

As a result of this relentless training, a new inner power began to awaken within Han Ja-Sung. It didn't appear in his ruined dantian; it arose within the heavenly delay, where a new Dantian had formed.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.

애초에 심연의 공주가 와서 한바탕 안 한 게 놀라울 지경이긴 하다만. 그렇게 중얼거리는 나였다. [무슨 소리입니까?] “뭐?” [그곳 또한 심연의 공주가 존재합니다.] “…….” [이실디. 그게 그녀의 이름입니다. 조심하십시오.] “계약 파투내고 싶나?” […….] “한 번만 더 이런 정보를 숨겼다간 그땐 넬타리드와의 모든 약속을 캔슬할 거다. 알아들어.” 이 새끼가 숨길 게 있고 아닌 게 있지.

"It's astonishing that the Abyss's princess hasn't already caused havoc," Davey muttered to himself. [What are you saying?] "What?" [The princess of the Abyss is indeed present there.] "..." [Her name is Isildi. Be careful.] "Are you trying to break our contract?" [....] "If you withhold information like this again, next time I'll cancel all agreements with Neltarid. Got it?" Kain really should have known what to keep hidden and what to disclose.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
영감탱이. “손님이다. 판 접어.” 그렇게 말한 그가 나를 향해 다가왔다. “알만한 것 같으니 찾아온 것 같은데. 무슨 일이오?” 그의 질문에 나는 대뜸 본론을 던졌다. “이걸 찾으러 왔다.” 나는 케인이 맡겼던 절대보옥을 꺼내 보이며 말했다. 동시에. 스르르릉!!! 차앙!!! 기다렸다는 듯 내부의 인원들이 일제히 발검하며 나를 경계한다.

“Old man.” “We have a guest. Close the game.” Approaching me, he said, “Seems like you know what you're after. What brings you here?” Davey directly presented his reason, “I came looking for this.” Davey revealed the Absolute Gem entrusted to him by Kain. Sliiide!!! Clang!!! Immediately, the sound of weapons being drawn echoed throughout the room. Occupants unsheathed their weapons, eyeing Davey warily as if they had anticipated this moment.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
실제로 몇몇 멍청이들은 그녀를 보며 음심을 품거나 얼굴을 붉히는 이도 있다. 눈앞에 저 여자가 사신 같은 존재라는 것도 모른 채 말이다. “힘없는 백성들의 고혈을 빨아먹고 불법을 저지른 놈들이다. 사정 봐주지 말고 잡아 들여!”

Some, oblivious to her true nature, dared to harbor sinister thoughts or blushed at her sight, not realizing the powerful being they were facing. "Drain the bloodsuckers who prey on the weak and break the law! Show no mercy," she ordered sternly, her fiery spirit contrasting with her cold demeanor.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
예! 단장! 개자식들! 니들 때문에 내 수련시간이 줄어들었어. 알아들어?! 나는 서류작업이 싫다고! 화를 내는 그녀는 차가운 인상과 다르게 굉장히 화끈한 성정을 지니고 있었다.

"Understood, leader!" the warriors responded in unison. "Those jerks! They've cut into my training time. Understand?! I hate paperwork!" Yun Hee-Ryeong, known for her chilly exterior, was fuming with anger. Her fiery nature was in stark contrast to her cool facade, revealing a deeply passionate spirit beneath her disciplined warrior demeanor.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
데이비. 그때였다. 말없이 그녀를 바라보던 그녀가 인상을 찌푸리며 의지를 전해왔다. ‘무슨 일이야.’ ‘그것이…….’ 그녀는 이해할 수 없다는 듯 내게 자신이 본 것을 보내주었다. 동시에 내게 남은 심연의 힘이 그녀의 힘과 연동되며 상태창이 드러났다. 내가 아닌. 푸른 머리칼의 어린 여성에 관한 정보였다.

"Davey," she began, her expression troubled, conveying a silent message. 'What's wrong?' 'This...' She transmitted to Davey what she had seen, but it was something she couldn’t comprehend herself. At the same time, the residual power of the abyss within Davey linked with her strength, revealing a status window - not of mine, but about the young woman with blue hair.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
이름은 윤희령. 현무대의 단장. 천열문의 1대 제자이며, 맹의 전력 중 하나. 지독한 수련광. 정의로운 성정을 지닌 여인. 다 좋다.

Her name was Yun Hee-Ryeong. The leader of the Black Tortoise Unit, a primary disciple of the Heavenly Gate, and one of the Martial Alliance's formidable forces. Her dedication to training. A woman with a righteous nature. Everything is good.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
그녀가 한자성이 찾아 헤매던 대 사저라는 것도 그리 놀라울 것은 아니었다. 하지만. 단 한 가지가 나를 놀라게 만들었다. 윤희령이라는 이름이 아닌 숨겨진 그녀의 본명 때문이었다. [이실디]

It was not surprising that she was the great master that Han Ja-Sung had been searching for. However, one detail about her left me astounded - not her name, Yun Hee-Ryeong, but her true, hidden name. [Isildi]
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
그런 그녀의 미모를 보고 돈 생각을 했는지 소리 없이 그녀의 입을 틀어막고 납치하려던 자가 전신이 뒤틀려 바닥에 쓰러진다. 한두 번도 아니고 그런 사태가 계속되니 하통의 이런 왈패들도 뭔가 위험하다는 것을 깨달은 듯 보였다.

Her beauty was a stark contrast to their grim surroundings that people couldn’t help but look at her and think of the money she could bring. A man surged forward to cover her mouth as he tried to kidnap her, however, his body twisted grotesquely. Repeated incidents like this seemed to finally alert the slum's ruffians to the lurking danger in their midst.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
그리고, 하수구를 지나 최심부 쪽으로 들어섰을 때. 나는 공기가 변한 것을 느낄 수 있었다. 관과 무림맹에서도 어지간해선 건드리지 않는 왈패들의 근원지. 인간 쓰레기통이며. 하통의 심연이라 불리는 곳이기도 하다.

As Davey and Perserque passed a sewer and entered the deepest part of the slums, Davey sensed a shift in the atmosphere. They ventured into a place even the officials and the Martial Alliance rarely dared to disturb - the origin of the slum's worst elements. It was a human wasteland, known as the abyss of the slums.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
하통 최심부? 이봐, 공자. 내 당신과 정이 있는 건 아니지만 그래도 충고하건대, 거긴 들어가지 마. 거긴 돈이 되면 제 가족도 고기로 잘라서 파는 놈들이니까. 어지간한 쓰레기들도 그곳은 얼씬도 하지 않지. 제 잘난 맛에 사는 무림인들이 겁도 없이 그곳에 들어갔다가 다신 살아나오지 못했네. 특히 저 뒤의 소저 정도의 미모라면 아주 완벽한 먹잇감이지.

A wary local, recognizing Davey, warned him, “The deepest part of the slums? Look here, sir. I’ve got no fondness for you, but still, a piece of advice – don't venture there. That place is so vile, they'd chop up their own family for profit. Even the regular scum avoid it. I've seen arrogant martial artists enter, thinking they're invincible, and never come out alive. Especially that lady behind you, with her beauty, she'd be perfect prey," remarked one of the onlookers, eyeing Perserque with a sinister intent.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
애초에 이 하통의 최심부까지 들어온 이유가 있었다. 가장 위험한 곳이지만. 가장 정보가 많이 들어오는 곳이기도 하다. 심연이 그녀의 권능을 뚫을 수 있는 게 확실해진 이상 마냥 신뢰할 순 없지만 그렇다고 버릴 수도 없는 권능이었다.

They had ventured into the deepest part of the slums for a reason. Despite its dangers, this place was a nexus of information. Now that it was clear the Abyss could breach Perserque’s powers, those powers couldn’t be blindly trusted; yet, they were too crucial to be discarded.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
그녀의 의지가 전해져 오자 나는 말 없이 품 안에서 소매치기에게서 역 소매치기 짓을 한 주머니의 돈을 모조리 뿌렸다. “알아서들 주워가.” 그렇게 말한 나는 페르세르크를 향해 다가오는 거지를 향해 빙그레 웃어 보였다. “주워가라고.” “흡…….”

Responding to her signal, Davey silently took out a pouch, cleverly pickpocketed from a thief earlier, and scattered its contents. "Help yourselves," he announced, flashing a grin at a beggar approaching Perserque. "Take it," he added, with a satisfied sigh from the onlooker.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
내 눈을 마주친 거지가 움찔하더니 물러난다. 이후 나는 페르세르크가 가리켰던 거지에게 다가갔다. 다른 거지와 다르게 아무 말도 하지 않는 그를 보며 나는 조용히 물었다. “장물아비 금기유가 어디 있는지 알고 있나?” 내 물음에 말없이 고개를 숙이고 있던 거지가 천천히 고개를 들었다. 그리고는 나를 바라본다.

As the beggar met Davey's gaze, he flinched and backed away. Davey then approached the beggar Perserque had pointed out, who was distinctively silent. "Do you know where to find the fence, Gum Gi-Yu?" Davey asked quietly. The beggar slowly lifted his head, meeting Davey's eyes.
You will help me translate Korean novels into English. I will give you sentences in Korean, and you will translate it into English.
그게 누구요? 몰라? 진짜로? 빙그레 웃은 내가 손에 검은 화염을 일으키자 주변의 분위기가 일순간 싸늘하게 변했다. 이봐. 공자. 여기서 함부로 강한척하지 않는 게 좋아. 강한 척이라. 뭔가 단단히 착각하는 거 같아서 하는 말인데. 화르르륵……. 여기 쓰레기통 하나 처리하는 데에 내가 몇 초나 소모할 거 같나.

"Who's that?" "You really don't know?" Davey mockingly asked. Davey's grin widened as he conjured a black flame in his hand, instantly chilling the atmosphere around him. "Look, lad. It's not wise to act tough here," warned a passerby. "Tough act? Seems like there's a serious misunderstanding here," Davey retorted. Whoosh The flame crackled ominously. "How many seconds do you think it'll take me to dispose of one trash can here?"
